summary: This document is a phone record from August 10, 2019, showing a communication from a Communication Technician at the US Department of Justice's MCC-New York facility. It appears to be a record of a call or communication related to the Epstein case, as indicated by the EFTA document number.

persons.name: Communication Technician
persons.context: The individual who generated or is associated with the phone record from the US Department of Justice's MCC-New York facility.

events.title: Phone Record Creation
events.description: A phone record was created on Saturday, August 10, 2019, at 3:04:24 PM, by a Communication Technician at the MCC-New York facility.

locations: MCC-New York, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007-1704
keyFacts: The document is a phone record dated August 10, 2019, from the MCC-New York federal detention facility.
The record was created by a Communication Technician at the US Department of Justice.
The document is part of the Epstein case files, as indicated by the EFTA document number EFTA00060282.
